net.sf.microlog.format
Class ConfigurableFormatter

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.microlog.format.ConfigurableFormatter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Formatter
public class ConfigurableFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Formatter

A formatter that could be configured how the formatting shall be. It is not possible to set the order of the output.

Author:
Johan Karlsson (johan.karlsson@jayway.se)
